assetProfile.address2: 18th Floor Jl. Mega Kuningan Barat III, Lot 10, 1-6 Kawasan Mega Kuningan
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: PT Multipolar Technology Tbk provides IT services and solutions in Indonesia. The company offers IT strategy and planning services, such as digital transformation planning, IT operation and governance, independent validation and verification, IT PMO set up and operation assistance, data center consulting, and data governance; customer experience platform and services, including e-channel, mobility, communication system and collaboration, business process outsourcing; and branch IT services; and digital insights solutions comprising big data and analytics, business performance intelligence, and artificial intelligence. It also provides banking, enterprise resource planning, smart office, enterprise project management, and field operations managed solutions; merchant IT services, IT operation and application managed services, IT service management, and healthcare solutions; and blockchain, Internet of Things, OS and virtualization, database platform, services oriented architecture, container management, application development platform, and application program interface management solutions. In addition, the company offers ICT infrastructure, co-location, data center managed, and cloud services, as well as disaster recovery as a service; and security solutions, and managed security service provider/security operation center. It serves financial, education, government, health care, manufacturing, oil and gas, and retail sectors. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Multipolar Technology Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Multipolar Tbk.
